Item.TextToWrite: Hey! Welcome to Town! # My name is Julian, I run the workshop. I could always use more help making schematics! Anyway, would you like to see whats for sale? `
Item.SelectableOptions: yes~OpenJulianShop,no~ExitDialogue, Where can I find schematics?~Load.11

Item.TextToWrite: You can find them in chests scattered across the wilderness or discover them while crafting! # Is there anything else? `
Have you by chance seen a big metal gear? Can't seem to remember what I did with it.
carry the two... eighteen? No wait... thirty two? That doesn't seem right either.
